headline: Automate with Google Workspace & leverage AI | Entrepreneurship | SaaS | Investing | Sports & Health | Design | Fatherhood x5
about: Yannick is CEO of award winning, Google recommended Sheetgo, which allows everyday workspace and office users to automate their work. Previously he co-founded a 'best for the world' B-Corp real estate developer that designed and built thousands of social eco-homes in Brazil. He spent a decade in tech-focused top US corporate companies after graduating in computer systems, finance, marketing, and industrial engineering. He has published articles and a book, given dozens of speeches including TEDx and Columbia University, while being featured in publications like The Economist. He has 5 children and loves sports, design, and music.

headline: Investor | Venture Capital & Private Equity | M&A | Board Member | Family Office |Asset Management
about:
Some careers follow a straight line. Mine has always followed conviction.

I’ve spent my career at the intersection of finance, strategy, and entrepreneurship, building, backing, and strengthening companies across stages and cycles.

I began in business consulting and corporate finance at PwC, where I developed a strong foundation in strategic analysis, financial structuring, and working closely with senior management teams.
In private equity, I was part of several landmark transactions through a €500 million investment vehicle. Among them, the sales of Panrico to Apax and Caprabo to Eroski stand out, complex operations requiring stakeholder alignment, operational turnaround, and large-scale execution. The total exit value across these transactions exceeded €2 billion. These formative years sharpened my ability to see both the numbers and the narrative behind them.

Later, at CaixaBank, I took on broader responsibilities across structured finance, asset management, and risk oversight. I created and led the specialized risk management team for structured finance, building a unit of over 30 professionals and overseeing total assets exceeding €50 billion. We managed international credit and investment portfolios with a strong focus on long-term performance and institutional resilience.

In recent years, I’ve focused on venture capital, leading early and growth-stage investments across Europe and the U.S. as Managing Director at Criteria Venture Tech. I’ve completed more than 20 successful exit transactions, including acquisitions by global players such as Meta and Apple, as well as top-tier private equity firms. I’m particularly drawn to mission-driven teams and breakthrough technologies reshaping the way we live, work, and connect.

Across board roles and investment committees, I’ve maintained a consistent principle: combining vision with discipline to build companies, and portfolios, that stand the test of time.

Having worked across the full investment lifecycle, from early-stage tech to mature buyouts, from institutional portfolios to family office strategies, I bring a holistic view to capital allocation, growth, and value creation.

Because markets change, but fundamentals endure. And the best decisions are rarely the loudest, they're the ones made with determination, clarity, and a long view. That’s the mindset I bring to every partnership I build.

Actively backing founders who challenge the status quo with transformative technology. PreSeed-stage investments in the next generation of B2B software companies. Send deck to: deck@paocapital.com

validation_reasons_english: Experience in Venture Capital and Private Equity.; Active investments in Pre-Seed and Seed stages in B2B software.; Extensive experience in financial risk management and structuring complex operations.; Experience in M&A and board membership.

headline: Global COO and UK managing director @ Lura Care |  Co-founder @ Commly.ai
about:
Entrepreneur with 20+ years of experience building and scaling businesses across diverse industries. I thrive on strategic thinking, innovation, and leadership, knowing that true success lies in the ability to execute ideas effectively.

I am currently focused on expanding the reach and impact of Lura Care, a domiciliary healthcare provider, as Global COO and managing Director in the UK, improving care for those who need it most.

As co-founder of Commo (est. 2004), I’ve helped launch and grow over 30 startups by advising clients on marketing, branding, PR, and advertising strategies. I also ventured into entrepreneurship with my own startup, Chopit, which aimed to empower retailers to compete in the digital era by delivering personalized shopping experiences. While the project didn’t succeed as planned, it was a valuable lesson in resilience and innovation.

Earlier in my career, I worked as a management consultant at Cluster (now Oliver Wyman), where I played a key role in building telecom operators and internet startups across Spain, Latin America, and India.

With a background in Telecom Engineering and an MBA from IESE Business School, I am passionate about leveraging technology to create human-centered solutions. I believe in driving opportunity-led transformation for businesses to embrace the future with confidence.

Let’s connect if you share an interest in innovation, leadership, or creating meaningful impact through business.

headline: Co-Founder & CTO at Zazume
about:
I have 15 years of experience in software engineering. Big part of this time related with mobile technology (iOS/Android) even when my background is a backend/DevOps engineer. 

I considere myself as a product-oriented engineer and capable of leading the management of the product. 

I led multiple engineering teams as maximum of 10 people. In all those teams I was able to unite and create an agile methodology which allow me to build high-performance teams.

I've been part of different teams and even reporting to people with different culture in multiple countries such as UK, Spain, Poland, Bulgaria, Czech Rep, and Israel.

headline: Chief Legal Officer (CLO) at zk-Call & Digital Co.
about:
Greetings, I am Victor Soler, combining rigorous legal acumen and strategic foresight from a distinguished career across Spain's premier legal institutions. Originating from Sevilla, my education at CEU (Cardenal Spínola, University of Seville), provided dual degrees in Law and Political Sciences, forming a robust base for my specialization in corporate governance and intellectual property law.

Early in my career at Montero Aramburu Abogados, I excelled in formulating legal defenses for trade secrets, swiftly ascending to roles requiring intricate compliance strategies that balanced intellectual property protection with corporate operability within EU frameworks. My expertise deepened with an LL.M. focused on mergers and acquisitions at Roca Junyent, where I led high-stakes negotiations, ensuring seamless corporate mergers through meticulous due diligence and strategic transaction structuring to optimize tax and regulatory compliance across jurisdictions.

My tenure at leading firms like Pérez-Llorca and Garrigues was marked by managing multifaceted international trade agreements and developing sophisticated defense strategies for high-profile intellectual property litigation. At Pérez-Llorca, I spearheaded initiatives to enhance corporate compliance and governance, significantly elevating transparency and stakeholder confidence through revamped ethical frameworks.

Currently, as Chief Legal Officer at zk-Call & Digital Co., I oversee our global legal operations, focusing on safeguarding the company’s expansion and innovation endeavors against the backdrop of international legal complexities and digital compliance challenges. This role synthesizes my extensive experience, applying it to cutting-edge issues at the intersection of technology and law.

My commitment extends beyond mere practice; I am devoted to mentoring emerging legal talents, instilling a blend of ethical rigor and analytical precision. This mentorship is underpinned by practical insights drawn from my diverse experiences, aimed at equipping new lawyers with the skills to navigate an evolving legal landscape.

In essence, my career is a testament to a relentless pursuit of legal excellence, characterized by a strategic approach to complex legal challenges and a deep commitment to shaping the legal framework within which global businesses operate.

‡ For legal inquiries or claims concerning zk-Call & Digital Company, direct communication is encouraged via email at victor-soler@zkcall.net or through LinkedIn; Your concerns will be addressed promptly and expertly.
validation_reasons_spanish: Experiencia legal en empresas de software y tecnología.; Amplio conocimiento en fusiones y adquisiciones, propiedad intelectual y cumplimiento normativo.; Posición actual como Chief Legal Officer demuestra experiencia en la gestión legal global.; Experiencia en el desarrollo de estrategias legales para la expansión internacional.; Historial en firmas legales de prestigio y experiencia en litigios de propiedad intelectual.
validation_reasons_english: Legal experience in software and technology companies.; Extensive knowledge in mergers and acquisitions, intellectual property, and regulatory compliance.; Current position as Chief Legal Officer demonstrates experience in global legal management.; Experience in developing legal strategies for international expansion.; Background in prestigious law firms and experience in intellectual property litigation.

headline: Socio en Ameba Research. Información que contribuye a tomar mejores decisiones.
about:
I am grateful as...

I am lucky as over the course of the years I have had the opportunity to acquire a comprehensive experience in business management, across very different industries: consultancy, consumer goods, research, foodservice, luxury, retail, durable goods,... but most importantly I have shared experience with great professionals from multiple industries, functions and companies. All together has shaped the way I work and the way I feel about business.

I am lucky because of all the people I have come across along the way, it was people that I have "worked with" and people that I have "worked for" and in all cases I have always learned something from them, sometimes it was what should be done and sometimes it was what should not be done and, believe me, both are equally important. 

I am lucky as I enjoy my work creating, selling and providing high value services and information for business, sometimes to big companies and sometimes to small ones, but always to companies that are successful in what they do. It brings to me the chance to keep learning, growing and moving forward, this is a part of my job that I enjoy every day.

I am lucky as my work involves a broad mix of different functions, (including client development, sales, product, marketing, analysis,...), it allows me to look into multiple geographies in Europe, LatAm and Asian- Pacific regions and it has also helped me to grow my managerial capabilities, knowledge and experience operating in challenging enviroments. 

For all of it I am grateful... and happy too, after all, it has been working and sharing with others that I have got the complete understanding of what is really important in business and in life. So, I want to thank my peers, bosses, customers and friends along the way for their support to bring me here and for playing such a relevant role in what I am.

All of it has placed me now where I am, a very unique project that brings together all the ideas I believe in plus all the experience and the learnings from my partners and team, so together we can deliver smart, relevant, efficient and actionable business information to our customers almost every day.

Finally, I want to share one key piece of learning that I got for sure, it is only the mix of your personal will-to-do and the support of your team that allows anyone to be successful, so you should take care of your team and make sure that you believe in what you do, as it is the best recipe for success I can share with you.
